displayName.japanese: アレルギー・アタック

description.english: Defeat the terrible sea serpent by using its weakness
description.german: Besiege die furchterregende Seeschlange, indem du ihre Schwäche nutzt
description.french: Vaincre le terrible serpent de mer en exploitant sa faiblesse
description.italian: Sconfiggi il terribile serpente marino sfruttando il suo punto debole
description.koreana: 약점을 이용해 무시무시한 바다 뱀을 물리쳐라
description.spanish: Derrota a la terrible serpiente marina usando su debilidad
description.schinese: 利用弱点击败可怕的海蛇
description.russian: Победить ужасного морского змея, используя его слабость
description.japanese: 弱点を突いて、恐ろしい海の蛇を打ち倒せ
description.brazilian: Derrote a terrível serpente marinha explorando sua fraqueza

displayName.japanese: 解き放たれた子猫たち

description.english: Escape the cave
description.german: Aus der Höhle entkommen
description.french: S’échapper de la grotte
description.italian: Fuga dalla grotta
description.spanish: Escapa de la cueva
description.schinese: 逃出洞穴
description.japanese: 洞窟を脱出せよ
description.brazilian: Escapar da caverna

description.english: Escape the dark cave on your own
description.german: Finde den Ausgang aus der dunklen Höhle nur mit dir selbst
description.french: Trouver la sortie de la grotte sombre en comptant uniquement sur soi-même
description.italian: Trova l'uscita dalla grotta buia contando solo su te stesso
description.koreana: 자신만 믿고 어두운 동굴의 출구를 찾아라
description.spanish: Encuentra la salida de la cueva oscura confiando solo en ti mismo
description.schinese: 凭借自身力量逃出黑暗洞穴
description.russian: Найти выход из темной пещеры, полагаясь только на себя
description.japanese: 自分だけを頼りに暗い洞窟の出口を探せ
description.brazilian: Encontre a saída da caverna escura confiando apenas em si mesmo

description.english: Find the fish by uncovering the secret of the cave dust
description.german: Finde den Fisch, indem du das Geheimnis des Höhlenstaubs lüftest
description.french: Trouver le poisson en perçant le secret de la poussière dans la grotte
description.italian: Trova il pesce svelando il segreto della polvere nella grotta
description.koreana: 동굴 먼지의 비밀을 밝혀 물고기를 찾아라
description.spanish: Descubre el secreto del polvo de la cueva y encuentra el pez
description.schinese: 揭开洞穴尘埃之谜，找到小鱼
description.russian: Найти рыбку, разгадав тайну пылинок в пещере
description.japanese: 洞窟の埃の謎を解き、小魚を見つけろ
description.brazilian: Encontre o peixe descobrindo o segredo do pó da caverna

displayName.english: Let the Wind Carry It Away
displayName.italian: Che il vento lo porti via
displayName.spanish: Que el viento se lo lleve

description.english: Throw a message bottle from a great height
description.german: Wirf eine Flaschenpost aus großer Höhe
description.french: Lancer une bouteille à message depuis une grande hauteur
description.italian: Lancia una bottiglia con un messaggio da grande altezza
description.spanish: Lanza una botella con mensaje desde gran altura
description.schinese: 从高空投下留言瓶
description.russian: Выбросить бутылку с посланием с большой высоты
description.japanese: 高い場所からメッセージボトルを投げ落とせ
description.brazilian: Jogue uma garrafa com mensagem de um lugar bem alto

description.english: Reach the spider through obstacles, relying only on your agility
description.german: Erreiche die Spinne nur mit Geschick durch alle Hindernisse
description.french: Atteindre l’araignée en surmontant les obstacles grâce à ton agilité
description.italian: Raggiungi il ragno superando gli ostacoli solo con la tua agilità
description.spanish: Llega hasta la araña superando obstáculos con pura agilidad
description.schinese: 仅凭敏捷穿越障碍直达蜘蛛
description.russian: Добраться до паука сквозь преграды, полагаясь только на ловкость
description.japanese: ただ敏捷性だけで障害を越え、クモに到達せよ
description.brazilian: Chegue até a aranha superando obstáculos com agilidade

displayName.german: Brücke hat den Test nicht bestanden
displayName.french: Le pont a échoué au test
displayName.italian: Il ponte non ha superato il test
displayName.spanish: El puente no pasó la prueba

description.english: Test the strength of the plant-made bridge
description.german: Teste die Stabilität der Pflanzenbrücke
description.french: Tester la solidité du pont fait de plantes
description.italian: Metti alla prova la resistenza del ponte fatto di piante
description.spanish: Pon a prueba la resistencia del puente de plantas
description.schinese: 测试植物桥的强度
description.japanese: 植物の橋の強度をテストせよ
description.brazilian: Teste a resistência da ponte feita de plantas

displayName.japanese: 地下の世界へようこそ

description.english: Finish a long fall
description.german: Beende einen langen Sturz
description.french: Terminer une longue chute
description.italian: Completa una lunga caduta
description.spanish: Completa una caída prolongada
description.schinese: 完成漫长下落
description.japanese: 長い落下を完遂せよ
description.brazilian: Use a magia felina para passar por uma fenda estreita

description.english: Restore the wounded bear to its original form
description.german: Stelle dem verletzten Bären seine ursprüngliche Form wieder her
description.french: Rendre sa forme originelle à l’ours blessé
description.italian: Riporta l'orso ferito alla sua forma originale
description.spanish: Devuelve al oso herido su forma original
description.schinese: 将受伤的熊恢复原本形态
description.japanese: 傷ついた熊を元の姿に戻せ
description.brazilian: Restaure a forma original do urso ferido

description.english: Fix the railway signal
description.german: Repariere das Eisenbahnsignal
description.french: Réparer le signal ferroviaire
description.italian: Ripara il segnale ferroviario
description.spanish: Repara la señal ferroviaria
description.schinese: 修复铁路信号
description.japanese: 鉄道信号を修理せよ
description.brazilian: Conserte o sinal ferroviário

description.english: Use cat magic to squeeze through a narrow passage
description.german: Nutze Katzenmagie, um dich durch einen engen Durchgang zu zwängen
description.french: Utiliser la magie féline pour passer par un passage étroit
description.italian: Usa la magia del gatto per passare attraverso uno stretto passaggio
description.spanish: Usa la magia felina para pasar por un pasaje estrecho
description.schinese: 使用小小的魔法挤入狭窄通道
description.russian: Пройти в узкий проход, используя магию котика
description.japanese: チビの魔法を使って狭い通路を抜けよ (チビ)
description.brazilian: Use a magia felina para passar por uma fenda estreita

displayName.spanish: Tributo al Guardián de las Puertas

description.english: Offer a gift to the Gatekeeper
description.german: Bring dem Torwächter ein Opfer dar
description.french: Faire une offrande au Gardien des Portes
description.italian: Fai un'offerta al Custode del Portale
description.spanish: Haz una ofrenda al Guardián de las Puertas
description.schinese: 献礼守门者
description.japanese: 門番に贈り物を捧げよ
description.brazilian: Ofereça um presente ao guardião do portão

description.english: Open the path to the mysterious lighthouse
description.german: Öffne den Weg zum geheimnisvollen Leuchtturm
description.french: Ouvrir le chemin vers le phare mystérieux
description.italian: Apri la strada verso il faro misterioso
description.spanish: Abre el camino hacia el misterioso faro
description.schinese: 开启通往神秘灯塔的道路
description.japanese: 謎の灯台への道を開け
description.brazilian: Abra o caminho para o farol misterioso

description.english: Open the Dream Gate by lulling the guardians with charm, potion, and silent secrets
description.german: Öffne das Tor der Träume, indem du die Wächter mit Magie, Trank und geheimnisvoller Stille einschläferst
description.french: Ouvrir les Portes du Rêve en endormant les gardiens avec des charmes, une potion et le silence secret
description.italian: Apri il Portale dei Sogni placando i guardiani con incanti, pozioni e silenzi misteriosi
description.koreana: 매력·마법약·비밀의 침묵으로 수호자를 잠재우고 꿈의 문을 열어라
description.spanish: Abre la Puerta de los Sueños adormeciendo a los guardianes con encantos, pociones y silencios secretos
description.schinese: 用魅力、魔药与秘密寂静催眠守护者，开启梦境之门
description.russian: Открыть врата грёз, убаюкав хранителей чарами, зельем и тайной тишины
description.japanese: 魅惑・魔薬・静寂の秘密で守護者を眠らせ、夢の門を開け
description.brazilian: Abra o portal dos sonhos encantando os guardiões com feitiço, poção e silêncio

description.english: Finish the game and reunite with an old friend
description.german: Beende das Spiel und begegne einem alten Freund erneut
description.french: Terminer le jeu et retrouver un vieil ami
description.italian: Completa il gioco e ritrova un vecchio amico
description.spanish: Completa el juego y reencuéntrate con un viejo amigo
description.schinese: 通关游戏，与故友重聚
description.russian: Пройти игру и встретить старого знакомого
description.japanese: ゲームをクリアして、古き友と再会せよ
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo e reencontre um velho amigo

description.english: Pick up your first note
description.german: Hebe deine erste Notiz auf
description.french: Ramasser ta première note
description.italian: Raccogli il tuo primo appunto
description.spanish: Recoge tu primera nota
description.schinese: 拾起你的第一条笔记
description.japanese: 最初のメモを拾え
description.brazilian: Pegue sua primeira anotação

description.english: Win the heart of the blue fluffball
description.german: Erobere das Herz der blauen Flauschkugel
description.french: Gagner le cœur de la boule de poils bleue
description.italian: Conquista il cuore del batuffolo blu
description.spanish: Gana el corazón de la bolita azul de peluche
description.schinese: 赢得蓝色毛球的心
description.japanese: 青いふわふわから心を勝ち取れ
description.brazilian: Conquiste o coração do fofinho azul

description.english: Make the kitty an offer he can't refuse
description.german: Mache dem Kätzchen ein Angebot, das es nicht ablehnen kann
description.french: Faire une offre irrésistible au petit chat
description.italian: Fai al gattino un'offerta che non può rifiutare
description.spanish: Hazle a Lumín una oferta que no podrá rechazar
description.schinese: 向亮宝提出让它无法拒绝的提议
description.russian: Сделать котику предложение, от которого он не сможет отказаться
description.japanese: イルミが断れないような提案をせよ
description.brazilian: Faça uma proposta irrecusável para o gatinho

description.english: Present the box to the lilac cat
description.german: Überreiche dem fliederfarbenen Kätzchen die Schachtel
description.french: Offrir une boîte au chat lilas
description.italian: Offri la scatola al gattino lilla
description.spanish: Entrégale la caja al gatito lila
description.schinese: 把盒子交给紫色的小猫
description.japanese: 紫の子猫に箱を手渡せ
description.brazilian: Ofereça a caixa ao gatinho lilás

displayName.spanish: No se te escapó ninguna nota

description.english: Collect all notes
description.german: Alle Notizen sammeln
description.french: Rassembler toutes les notes
description.italian: Raccogli tutte le annotazioni
description.spanish: Recoge todas las notas
description.schinese: 收集所有笔记
description.japanese: すべてのメモを集めよ
description.brazilian: Recolha todas as anotações

description.english: Collect all the game’s collectibles
description.german: Sammle alle Sammelobjekte im Spiel
description.french: Rassembler tous les objets du jeu
description.italian: Raccogli tutti i collezionabili del gioco
description.spanish: Recoge todos los coleccionables del juego
description.schinese: 收集游戏中所有收藏品
description.japanese: ゲームの全収集アイテムを集めよ
description.brazilian: Colete todos os itens do jogo
